blog.name: thekubertschool
blog.title: The Kubert School
blog.description: For the past 35+ years, we are the only school that specializes in the field of Cartoon-Graphics. We train students to be professional cartoonists, and/or commercial artists, and illustrators. In addition, our school is very unique compared to other art schools because we were founded and are run by cartoonists. All of our faculty are professional commercial artists -- cartoonists, illustrators, animators, and designers. We have produced hundreds of students who have gone on to become professionals in the comic book industry. Visit us at http://www.kubertschool.edu

summary: Spotlight on Kubert School alum Alex Maleev!   Alex is an Eisner Award-winning comic book artist best known for his work on the...
caption:
Spotlight on Kubert School alum Alex Maleev!  

Alex is an Eisner Award-winning comic book artist best known for his work on the Marvel Comics series Daredevil with Brian Michael Bendis.  Other notable projects include Ironman, Batman, Hellboy, Scarlet, Spider-Woman, and many others.

summary: Count Your Blessings 19
title: Count Your Blessings 19
body:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader

Warnings: Language. Lies. Friends with Benefits. Possessiveness. Fights. Kidnapping. Small amount of violence.

OKAY!! Just a heads up there is no abuse in this story from Steve. He’s written as an alpha male. Yes he’s possessive of his family and the woman he loves, but NOT ABUSIVE. If you’re reading that, than we really need to have a long talk so feel free to send me a message.

TAG LIST : If your name is crossed out. Check your settings before I remove you from the list. Please and Thank you. I did remove peaches, because I can’t tag them just an FYI.

“What the hell is that?” Buck looks around, squinting at the house.

“Throw back playlist.” Steve grins heading up the walk way to the house.

“How do you know that?” Luke chuckles.

“It’s Ari’s favorite to play in the car.” He shakes his head, unlocking the door.

The living room empty, the music coming from another room. Buck, Luke, Sam, Peter and Steve head for the kitchen, where they can hear the music radiating from. The five of them stop in the kitchen opening watching Y/N, Wanda, Gwen and Nat dance around the kitchen with Ari. Baking supplies are spread across the counter tops and tables. The mashup song Y/N and Ari listen to most is playing, Start Me Up/Livin’ On a Prayer.

Steve leans on the wall, arms folded over his chest, the guys stifling a chuckle. The girls completely into the song, the guys arrival going unnoticed. Till Wanda whirls around, freezing in her steps. She nudges Nat, who grins bumping into Y/N who flushes red patting at Gwen. Ari giggles between the girls, before she takes off, leaping into Buck’s arms.

“Don’t mean to interrupt.” Buck grins.

“We’re baking.” Wanda holds up the rubber scrapper.

“I thought you were,” he pauses looking at Ari “s-h-o-p-p-i-n-g.” She spells it out.

“I can spell shopping daddy.” Ari settles him with a look.

“You are your mothers child.” He chuckles.

“Oh well, Nat loved the Butter Cake at the diner, and Gwen’s been begging to know how to make the cinnamon rolls.” Y/N shrugs.

“She bakes?” Luke looks down at Steve.

“She bakes.” Steve chuckles. The five of them let out a breathy sigh, knowing they would need to start working out.

“So we’re baking today.” Nat grins.

“Right, well we’re upstairs. Keep the doors locked.” Steve nods. Buck sets Ari down, and they five of them head up the stairs as Michael Jackson songs starts, they hear it turn up and the girls singing along.

“You got your hands filled, boys.” Luke chuckles as he sits down on the love seat in what was the office.

“Is your girl trying to make us all fat, or just turn the woman we like into baking house wives?” Peter lifts his eyebrows.

“If you think a single one of those girls down there are house wife types, you are in the wrong house.” Buck laughs.

“Y/N would beat you with a wooden spoon just for saying that. She worked her ass off to graduate with a degree and get a job.” Steve smirks.

“I think he’d prefer if it was Gwen dishing out the beating.” Sam chuckles.

“Alright. Business boys.” Steve shakes his head. Flipping open the file, while Peter starts up the laptop.



You hold Ari in your arms letting her give a soft knock on the door of the office.

“Come in.” Steve calls. You get the door open, stepping in.

“Nap time.” You explain, Ari’s rubbing her eyes heavily.

“Kisses.” Ari croaks in her groggy voice.

“Of course.” Steve grins as You pass her over the desk top. You glance down, Bradley Construction catches your attention. Your eyes snap up as Ari gets passed around, to each of the men, getting her nap time kisses. Her little arms around Peter, the last of her stops.

“You’re looking into Bradley construction?” You stare at Steve.

“We think it was our construction guy, who did it.” Choosing his words carefully in front of Ari.

“Brad?!” Your voice choked and confused.

“You know him?” Steve’s brow snaps together. Ari buries her face into Peter’s shoulder, her eyes drooping.

“I need to put Ari down, than um, we need to talk.” You swallow.

“Fine.” Steve growls, glaring at you.

“How about we take this downstairs, away from baby ears.” Peter stands up. “I’ll put Ari in bed and meet you downstairs.” He doesn’t leave room for argument, he’s out of the office door and down the hall before you can plead him to let you do it.

“After you.” Steve mutters ushering you out the door.

“Don’t get pissy with me Steven.” You whisper back at him.

“You haven’t seen pissy yet.” He whispers at you. Buck snaps his fingers at the two of you heading for the hallway. You snatch the baby monitor off the living room table, shoving it at Steve, before you head into the kitchen grabbing the timer off the counter, the girls looking confused.

“Is everything okay?” Wanda asks softly.

“Apparently there is something Y/N knows about Bradley Construction.” Steve mutters as everyone heads outside for the deck.

“He found out about Brad, huh?” Gwen pats your shoulder. Steve growls something under his breathe.



“So the guy. He’s Brad Thomas.” Y/N nods, sitting on the railing on the deck. “As in Bradley Construction Company.” She sighs.

“You and Brad?” Buck looks lost. Nat swats him.

“For around a year.” She admits. Anger burns in his chest.

“The red truck?” He asks.

“Brad.” She nods.

“The guy from the last night?” He folds his arms over his chest.

“Brad.” She swallows. “He was begging me to run away with him. He said he would take care of me, promising to be a father to Ari.” She shrugs.

“Thought you said he never met her?” Steve grumbles.

“He hasn’t.” She shakes her head. “I told him, he doesn’t know her. I told him to stay away from me, from us, or you’d hurt him.” She peeks at him, a little pride blooms in his chest, she knew, she’d warned Brad. That made him feel a little better.

“What did he say to you?” Luke asks.

“He said he was getting out of construction, that he came into a lot of money and that he loves me.” She shakes her head, his knuckles turning white as he clenches his fist tighter. “He wasn’t happy when I told him I was staying with you.” She looks over at Steve. “Said you would knock me up and leave me again.” She chews the inside of her lip.

“Well he’s got part of that wrong.” Steve mutters.

“Does he have any family or friends around here?” Peter asks.

“He’s got some friends from his construction company, he plays poker with and goes to the bar with. But I never asked for names or about his family. It was strictly physical for me.” She explains, Steve’s stomach turns at her words.

“We need to work out our next step.” Buck nods.

“We’ll be in the kitchen. Listen for Ari.” Nat nods, pulling Y/N off the railing and ushering her back into the house.

“We run down the guys who he worked with?” Sam asks.

“Doubt he included any of them.” Luke shakes his head. “This was about starting over, not splitting.”

“So how the hell do we get our hands on him?” Peter asks.

“We’re going to have to give him what he wants.” Buck swallows.

OKAY!! Just a heads up there is no abuse in this story from Steve. He’s written as an alpha male. Yes he’s possessive of his family and the woman he loves, but NOT ABUSIVE. If you’re reading that, than we really need to have a long talk so feel free to send me a message.

TAG LIST : If your name is crossed out. Check your settings before I remove you from the list. Please and Thank you. I did remove peaches, because I can’t tag them just an FYI.

[[MORE]]

“What the hell is that?” Buck looks around, squinting at the house.

“Throw back playlist.” Steve grins heading up the walk way to the house.

“How do you know that?” Luke chuckles.

“It’s Ari’s favorite to play in the car.” He shakes his head, unlocking the door.

The living room empty, the music coming from another room. Buck, Luke, Sam, Peter and Steve head for the kitchen, where they can hear the music radiating from. The five of them stop in the kitchen opening watching Y/N, Wanda, Gwen and Nat dance around the kitchen with Ari. Baking supplies are spread across the counter tops and tables. The mashup song Y/N and Ari listen to most is playing, Start Me Up/Livin’ On a Prayer.

Steve leans on the wall, arms folded over his chest, the guys stifling a chuckle. The girls completely into the song, the guys arrival going unnoticed. Till Wanda whirls around, freezing in her steps. She nudges Nat, who grins bumping into Y/N who flushes red patting at Gwen. Ari giggles between the girls, before she takes off, leaping into Buck’s arms.

“Don’t mean to interrupt.” Buck grins.

“We’re baking.” Wanda holds up the rubber scrapper.

“I thought you were,” he pauses looking at Ari “s-h-o-p-p-i-n-g.” She spells it out.

“I can spell shopping daddy.” Ari settles him with a look.

“You are your mothers child.” He chuckles.

“Oh well, Nat loved the Butter Cake at the diner, and Gwen’s been begging to know how to make the cinnamon rolls.” Y/N shrugs.

“She bakes?” Luke looks down at Steve.

“She bakes.” Steve chuckles. The five of them let out a breathy sigh, knowing they would need to start working out.

“So we’re baking today.” Nat grins.

“Right, well we’re upstairs. Keep the doors locked.” Steve nods. Buck sets Ari down, and they five of them head up the stairs as Michael Jackson songs starts, they hear it turn up and the girls singing along.

“You got your hands filled, boys.” Luke chuckles as he sits down on the love seat in what was the office.

“Is your girl trying to make us all fat, or just turn the woman we like into baking house wives?” Peter lifts his eyebrows.

“If you think a single one of those girls down there are house wife types, you are in the wrong house.” Buck laughs.

“Y/N would beat you with a wooden spoon just for saying that. She worked her ass off to graduate with a degree and get a job.” Steve smirks.

“I think he’d prefer if it was Gwen dishing out the beating.” Sam chuckles.

“Alright. Business boys.” Steve shakes his head. Flipping open the file, while Peter starts up the laptop.



You hold Ari in your arms letting her give a soft knock on the door of the office.

“Come in.” Steve calls. You get the door open, stepping in.

“Nap time.” You explain, Ari’s rubbing her eyes heavily.

“Kisses.” Ari croaks in her groggy voice.

“Of course.” Steve grins as You pass her over the desk top. You glance down, Bradley Construction catches your attention. Your eyes snap up as Ari gets passed around, to each of the men, getting her nap time kisses. Her little arms around Peter, the last of her stops.

“You’re looking into Bradley construction?” You stare at Steve.

“We think it was our construction guy, who did it.” Choosing his words carefully in front of Ari.

“Brad?!” Your voice choked and confused.

“You know him?” Steve’s brow snaps together. Ari buries her face into Peter’s shoulder, her eyes drooping.

“I need to put Ari down, than um, we need to talk.” You swallow.

“Fine.” Steve growls, glaring at you.

“How about we take this downstairs, away from baby ears.” Peter stands up. “I’ll put Ari in bed and meet you downstairs.” He doesn’t leave room for argument, he’s out of the office door and down the hall before you can plead him to let you do it.

“After you.” Steve mutters ushering you out the door.

“Don’t get pissy with me Steven.” You whisper back at him.

“You haven’t seen pissy yet.” He whispers at you. Buck snaps his fingers at the two of you heading for the hallway. You snatch the baby monitor off the living room table, shoving it at Steve, before you head into the kitchen grabbing the timer off the counter, the girls looking confused.

“Is everything okay?” Wanda asks softly.

“Apparently there is something Y/N knows about Bradley Construction.” Steve mutters as everyone heads outside for the deck.

“He found out about Brad, huh?” Gwen pats your shoulder. Steve growls something under his breathe.



“So the guy. He’s Brad Thomas.” Y/N nods, sitting on the railing on the deck. “As in Bradley Construction Company.” She sighs.

“You and Brad?” Buck looks lost. Nat swats him.

“For around a year.” She admits. Anger burns in his chest.

“The red truck?” He asks.

“Brad.” She nods.

“The guy from the last night?” He folds his arms over his chest.

“Brad.” She swallows. “He was begging me to run away with him. He said he would take care of me, promising to be a father to Ari.” She shrugs.

“Thought you said he never met her?” Steve grumbles.

“He hasn’t.” She shakes her head. “I told him, he doesn’t know her. I told him to stay away from me, from us, or you’d hurt him.” She peeks at him, a little pride blooms in his chest, she knew, she’d warned Brad. That made him feel a little better.

“What did he say to you?” Luke asks.

“He said he was getting out of construction, that he came into a lot of money and that he loves me.” She shakes her head, his knuckles turning white as he clenches his fist tighter. “He wasn’t happy when I told him I was staying with you.” She looks over at Steve. “Said you would knock me up and leave me again.” She chews the inside of her lip.

“Well he’s got part of that wrong.” Steve mutters.

“Does he have any family or friends around here?” Peter asks.

“He’s got some friends from his construction company, he plays poker with and goes to the bar with. But I never asked for names or about his family. It was strictly physical for me.” She explains, Steve’s stomach turns at her words.

“We need to work out our next step.” Buck nods.

“We’ll be in the kitchen. Listen for Ari.” Nat nods, pulling Y/N off the railing and ushering her back into the house.

“We run down the guys who he worked with?” Sam asks.

“Doubt he included any of them.” Luke shakes his head. “This was about starting over, not splitting.”

“So how the hell do we get our hands on him?” Peter asks.

“We’re going to have to give him what he wants.” Buck swallows.

summary: Wanda X Reader
title: Wanda X Reader
body:
Wanda Maximoff X Reader: Purple Hearts

Warnings: Abuse implied

Part 2/?

Plot: Wanda finds a girl who has powers like her brother

Thanks Anonymous Requester!

( Not My Gif )

Everyone’s is quiet. Did they all hear him right?

“Steve is right,” Wanda says, breaking the silence. “Who else would want to give another person powers like this, but keep it a total secret?”

“That is true. Someone better call Fury.” Natasha suggests. “We should let him know.”

Steve calls Nick Fury and tells him about the situation. It’s true, he didn’t even know about this. He advises that they should go check it out tomorrow and he’ll prepare back up. Steve informs the rest of them of the plan. Bruce and Thor aren’t around at this time, so it’s the 5 of them.

They all head off to bed, but Wanda has trouble sleeping. She can’t stop thinking about Y/N and how scared she got when she realized she needed to get back. She can’t help thinking they were hurting her. She finally passed out, only to awake hours later by her alarm. Luckily, the mission is this afternoon, so she could try to sleep more. That is, until Steve “Mom At The Ready” Rogers knocks on her door.

“Come in.” She says, sitting up on the side of her bed.

“Hey. Everything okay? You didn’t come out for breakfast. You need to eat something before the mission.” Steve said in his soft voice.

“Yeah, I just had trouble sleeping last night so I stayed in bed a little longer,” Wanda told him, looking down at her hands.

“Are you worried about this girl?” He asks, walking over to her.

“I can’t stop thinking about what they might be doing to her,” she admits, now looking up to Steve.

“She survived this long, she can take another day.” He tries to comfort her. “Come get something to eat.”

“Okay, thanks.” She says standing up. They join the rest of the team and get ready to head out.

“So last night Nick sent someone out to scope out the factory. He was seen, not captured, but he was chased by people wearing Hydra symbols. Odds are, they know we are coming, so be ready for attacks.” Steve informs everyone. They are in the back of a truck, heading for the building. “Wanda, your job is to safely get Y/N out of there, since she knows you. The rest of us will take down the facility.”

“Got it,” Wanda replies.

Once they arrive at their drop off point, they all unload and head through a short wooded area behind the building. Clint stations himself in a tree, to sniper anyone from above, while the rest are on foot. Except for Tony, he hovers around just because he can.

They begin getting fired at from a machine up ahead. Tony blasts it apart but causes a loud noise. They now know they are here, and the first wave of people come running out, shooting at them. They fight them off pretty easily, as they have a good group of people. A few more small waves come out before they make it inside the facility and Clint joins back with them from his tree. Wore out and scratched up, they spread out in pairs of 2 and Wanda goes off alone to find Y/N.

Wanda makes her way quietly down some hallways, she only runs into three people, taking them down with a slide of her hand.

“Left side is cleared, no sign of Y/N” Steve calls through the earpiece.

“Right side cleared. Same.” Clint announces too. “Wanda? You alright in the front area?”

“I’ve only come in contact with 3 people so far. Still can’t find Y/N.” Wanda says.

“We will come help you search over there.” Natasha pops in.

Right after, Wanda comes across a door, bolted shut. She uses her powers to unlock it from the outside and quietly slides the door open, ready to attack if anyone were inside.

The dark room fills with light as she opens the door. She sees Y/N tucked away in the corner, luckily alone.

“Wanda?” Y/N says, looking over at her. She’s much messier than she was last night. It looks like they found out she left, she had gashes along her face and arms and dried tear marks on her face where they washed away some dirt. Wanda doesn’t think all of that was there last night.

“We gotta get you out of here,” Wanda tells her, stepping in the empty room.

“I can’t walk.” Y/N tells her. She tries to stand, but her right leg is limp.

“What happened? Nevermind, let’s just get you to safety first.” Wand says. She runs over to her and lifts her up. She meets up with everyone outside of the door and they run back to the truck.

Once inside the truck, Steve calls Fury to have some agents go search the place and that they’ve cleared it out. Natasha calls the Avengers facility to get ready for treatment of injuries and a numb leg with an unknown cause.

Once they arrive at their drop off point, they all unload and head through a short wooded area behind the building. Clint stations himself in a tree, to sniper anyone from above, while the rest are on foot. Except for Tony, he hovers around just because he can.

They begin getting fired at from a machine up ahead. Tony blasts it apart but causes a loud noise. They now know they are here, and the first wave of people come running out, shooting at them. They fight them off pretty easily, as they have a good group of people. A few more small waves come out before they make it inside the facility and Clint joins back with them from his tree. Wore out and scratched up, they spread out in pairs of 2 and Wanda goes off alone to find Y/N.

Wanda makes her way quietly down some hallways, she only runs into three people, taking them down with a slide of her hand.

“Left side is cleared, no sign of Y/N” Steve calls through the earpiece.

“Right side cleared. Same.” Clint announces too. “Wanda? You alright in the front area?”

“I’ve only come in contact with 3 people so far. Still can’t find Y/N.” Wanda says.

“We will come help you search over there.” Natasha pops in.

Right after, Wanda comes across a door, bolted shut. She uses her powers to unlock it from the outside and quietly slides the door open, ready to attack if anyone were inside.

The dark room fills with light as she opens the door. She sees Y/N tucked away in the corner, luckily alone.

“Wanda?” Y/N says, looking over at her. She’s much messier than she was last night. It looks like they found out she left, she had gashes along her face and arms and dried tear marks on her face where they washed away some dirt. Wanda doesn’t think all of that was there last night.

“We gotta get you out of here,” Wanda tells her, stepping in the empty room.

“I can’t walk.” Y/N tells her. She tries to stand, but her right leg is limp.

“What happened? Nevermind, let’s just get you to safety first.” Wand says. She runs over to her and lifts her up. She meets up with everyone outside of the door and they run back to the truck.

Once inside the truck, Steve calls Fury to have some agents go search the place and that they’ve cleared it out. Natasha calls the Avengers facility to get ready for treatment of injuries and a numb leg with an unknown cause.

summary: Your Woman Crush Weekly is Evangeline Lilly! The 38 year old actress gained a lot of notoriety back in 2004 with a starring role...
caption:
Your Woman Crush Weekly is Evangeline Lilly!

The 38 year old actress gained a lot of notoriety back in 2004 with a starring role in the hit ABC series Lost.  She started gaining some film roles, most notably in The Hurt Locker and the 2011 sci-fi boxing film, Real Steel. 

She landed a major role in the Hobbit film franchise as Tauriel,her first major franchise film role.  However it’s her role in the first Ant-Man film that started to raiser her profile to genuine A-list status.  She’s set to reprise her role as Hope Van Dyne in the follow up film, Ant-Man and The Wasp and will dawn The Wasp costume for the first time.  She’s set to appear in the 4th Avengers film as The Wasp as well.

She’s incredibly talented, and should be garnering more major roles after Avengers 4 wraps up.
